name: 程耀毅
objective: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Literature search
3. Student report 1
4. Talk 1
5. Student report 2
6. Talk 2
7. Talk 3
8. Talk 4
9. Talk 5
10. Student report 3
11. Talk 6
12. Student report 4
13. Talk 7
14. Talk 8
15. Student report 5
16. Student report 6
17. Student report 7
18. Student report 8
scorePolicy:
出席率與筆記: 15%
口頭報告: 70%
課堂參與: 15%
